project.name: HowToDo
project.title: HowToDo

description.short: HowToDo is a system to match To-Do entries to How-To entries
description.long: HowToDo matches To-Do entries to How-To Entries and breaks down the How-Tos into a list of smaller, more actionable items. The system is implemented as a web service, and accessible by both agents and human users.

research.short: Breaking down human centered task descriptions into formalized processes and matching of To-Do items to How-Tos.
research.long: Our research has focused on evaluating out matching component with regards to coverage and correctness, on two different To-Do corpora.
